import numpy  as np 
import pandas as pd
pd.set_option('display.max_columns', None)
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import plotly.express as px
import seaborn as sns
sns.set(style="darkgrid")
sns.set_palette("bright")

csv_0 = pd.read_csv('../input/jane-street-public-leaderboards/jane-street-market-prediction-publicleaderboard_0.csv',index_col=0)
csv_1 = pd.read_csv('../input/jane-street-public-leaderboards/jane-street-market-prediction-publicleaderboard_1.csv',index_col=0)
csv_2 = pd.read_csv('../input/jane-street-public-leaderboards/jane-street-market-prediction-publicleaderboard_2.csv',index_col=0)
csv_3 = pd.read_csv('../input/jane-street-public-leaderboards/jane-street-market-prediction-publicleaderboard_3.csv',index_col=0)
csv_4 = pd.read_csv('../input/jane-street-public-leaderboards/jane-street-market-prediction-publicleaderboard_4.csv',index_col=0)
csv_5 = pd.read_csv('../input/jane-street-public-leaderboards/jane-street-market-prediction-publicleaderboard_5.csv',index_col=0)
csv_6 = pd.read_csv('../input/jane-street-public-leaderboards/jane-street-market-prediction-publicleaderboard_6.csv',index_col=0)
csv_7 = pd.read_csv('../input/jane-street-public-leaderboards/jane-street-market-prediction-publicleaderboard_7.csv',index_col=0)
csv_8 = pd.read_csv('../input/jane-street-public-leaderboards/jane-street-market-prediction-publicleaderboard_8.csv',index_col=0)
csv_9 = pd.read_csv('../input/jane-street-public-leaderboards/jane-street-market-prediction-publicleaderboard_9.csv',index_col=0)
csv_10 = pd.read_csv('../input/jane-street-public-leaderboards/jane-street-market-prediction-publicleaderboard_10.csv',index_col=0)
csv_11 = pd.read_csv('../input/jane-street-public-leaderboards/jane-street-market-prediction-publicleaderboard_11.csv',index_col=0)
csv_12 = pd.read_csv('../input/jane-street-public-leaderboards/jane-street-market-prediction-publicleaderboard_12.csv',index_col=0)

csv_1.rename(columns={"Score":"score 1"},inplace=True)
csv_2.rename(columns={"Score":"score 2"},inplace=True)
csv_3.rename(columns={"Score":"score 3"},inplace=True)
csv_4.rename(columns={"Score":"score 4"},inplace=True)
csv_5.rename(columns={"Score":"score 5"},inplace=True)
csv_6.rename(columns={"Score":"score 6"},inplace=True)
csv_7.rename(columns={"Score":"score 7"},inplace=True)
csv_8.rename(columns={"Score":"score 8"},inplace=True)
csv_9.rename(columns={"Score":"score 9"},inplace=True)
csv_10.rename(columns={"Score":"score 10"},inplace=True)
csv_11.rename(columns={"Score":"score 11"},inplace=True)
csv_12.rename(columns={"Score":"score 12"},inplace=True)

csv_0.insert(loc=3, column='position 0', value=np.arange(start=1, stop=(len(csv_0)+1) ))
csv_1.insert(loc=3, column='position 1', value=np.arange(start=1, stop=(len(csv_1)+1) ))
csv_2.insert(loc=3, column='position 2', value=np.arange(start=1, stop=(len(csv_2)+1) ))
csv_3.insert(loc=3, column='position 3', value=np.arange(start=1, stop=(len(csv_3)+1) ))
csv_4.insert(loc=3, column='position 4', value=np.arange(start=1, stop=(len(csv_4)+1) ))
csv_5.insert(loc=3, column='position 5', value=np.arange(start=1, stop=(len(csv_5)+1) ))
csv_6.insert(loc=3, column='position 6', value=np.arange(start=1, stop=(len(csv_6)+1) ))
csv_7.insert(loc=3, column='position 7', value=np.arange(start=1, stop=(len(csv_7)+1) ))
csv_8.insert(loc=3, column='position 8', value=np.arange(start=1, stop=(len(csv_8)+1) ))
csv_9.insert(loc=3, column='position 9', value=np.arange(start=1, stop=(len(csv_9)+1) ))
csv_10.insert(loc=3, column='position 10', value=np.arange(start=1, stop=(len(csv_10)+1) ))
csv_11.insert(loc=3, column='position 11', value=np.arange(start=1, stop=(len(csv_11)+1) ))
csv_12.insert(loc=3, column='position 12', value=np.arange(start=1, stop=(len(csv_12)+1) ))

csv_1 = csv_1.drop(['TeamName','SubmissionDate'], axis='columns')
csv_2 = csv_2.drop(['TeamName','SubmissionDate'], axis='columns')
csv_3 = csv_3.drop(['TeamName','SubmissionDate'], axis='columns')
csv_4 = csv_4.drop(['TeamName','SubmissionDate'], axis='columns')
csv_5 = csv_5.drop(['TeamName','SubmissionDate'], axis='columns')
csv_6 = csv_6.drop(['TeamName','SubmissionDate'], axis='columns')
csv_7 = csv_7.drop(['TeamName','SubmissionDate'], axis='columns')
csv_8 = csv_8.drop(['TeamName','SubmissionDate'], axis='columns')
csv_9 = csv_9.drop(['TeamName','SubmissionDate'], axis='columns')
csv_10 = csv_10.drop(['TeamName','SubmissionDate'], axis='columns')
csv_11 = csv_11.drop(['TeamName','SubmissionDate'], axis='columns')
csv_12 = csv_12.drop(['SubmissionDate'], axis='columns')

merged_df = csv_1.join(csv_2).join(csv_3).join(csv_4).join(csv_5).join(csv_6).join(csv_7).join(csv_8).join(csv_9).join(csv_10).join(csv_11).join(csv_12)

# now take a look at the Top 30
merged_df.filter(regex='TeamName|score',axis=1).sort_values(by='score 12', ascending=False).head(30).style.bar(subset=['score 1', 'score 2', 'score 3', 'score 4', 'score 5', 'score 6', 'score 7', 'score 8', 'score 9', 'score 10', 'score 11', 'score 12'], color='#00c0b0')

top_9 = merged_df.filter(regex='TeamName|score',axis=1).sort_values(by='score 12', ascending=False).head(9)
top_9 = top_9.set_index('TeamName').T
fig = px.line(top_9,  y=top_9.columns, title="Historic LB scores for the current 'In the money' teams")
fig.show();

fig = px.line(top_18,  y=top_18.columns, title="Current Gold medal teams")
fig.show();

color_3 = 'orange'

color_7 = 'teal'
color_8 = 'yellowgreen'

sns.set(font_scale=1.3)

binwidth = 20
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(17,10))
#sns.histplot(data=merged_df_2_minus_1, x="delta_2_minus_1", kde=True, color=color_1, binwidth=binwidth, alpha =0.4)

print("Mean (Δ(3-2)):   %.1f" % merged_df_3_minus_2.mean()['delta_3_minus_2'],", S.D. (Δ(3-2)):   %.1f" % np.sqrt(merged_df_3_minus_2.var()['delta_3_minus_2']))
print("Mean (Δ(4-3)):     %.1f" % merged_df_4_minus_3.mean()['delta_4_minus_3'],", S.D. (Δ(4-3)):   %.1f" % np.sqrt(merged_df_4_minus_3.var()['delta_4_minus_3']))

print("Mean (Δ(10-9)):    %.1f" % merged_df_10_minus_9.mean()['delta_10_minus_9'],", S.D. (Δ(10-9)):  %.1f" % np.sqrt(merged_df_10_minus_9.var()['delta_10_minus_9']))
print("Mean (Δ(11-10)):    %.1f" % merged_df_11_minus_10.mean()['delta_11_minus_10'],", S.D. (Δ(11-10)): %.1f" % np.sqrt(merged_df_11_minus_10.var()['delta_11_minus_10']))

print("")

print("Mean (Δ(3-1)):  %.1f" % merged_df_3_minus_1.mean()['delta_3_minus_1'],", S.D. (Δ(3-1)):   %.1f" % np.sqrt(merged_df_3_minus_1.var()['delta_3_minus_1']))

    title="The black line represents Δ=0.",
    xaxis_title="old LB score",
    yaxis_title="new LB score",)
fig.add_shape(type="line",x0=0, y0=0, x1=6000, y1=6000,line=dict(color="black",width=3,))
fig.update_traces(mode='markers', marker_size=3)
fig.show();
source.725d85a1:
plt.figure(figsize = (18,10))
ax = sns.histplot(merged_df_2_minus_1['delta_2_minus_1'], binwidth=25)
values = np.array([rec.get_height() for rec in ax.patches])
norm = plt.Normalize(values.min(), values.max())
colors = plt.cm.jet_r(norm(values))
for rec, col in zip(ax.patches, colors):
    rec.set_color(col)
plt.title("Private LB(#2) - Private LB(#1)", size=18)
plt.xlabel("Δ (LB score)", fontsize=18)
plt.ylabel("", fontsize=16)
plt.xlim(-200, 700);
plt.savefig('distributon.png')
plt.show();

# output the merged dataframe
merged_df.to_csv('merged_JS_scores.csv', index=True)
source.b73a5106: To find the progress of a specific Team Name, for example our team *Semper Augustus*
